plot: A farmer sells his land to go to Seoul and become a rickshaw driver. When his wife is hospitalized, he attempts to steal money to pay for her surgery. He is caught and placed in prison. ...
title: Imjaeobtneun naleutbae
plot_es: A farmer sells his land to go to Seoul and become a rickshaw driver. When his wife is hospitalized, he attempts to steal money to pay for her surgery. He is caught and placed in prison. ...
plot_en: A farmer sells his land to go to Seoul and become a rickshaw driver. When his wife is hospitalized, he attempts to steal money to pay for her surgery. He is caught and placed in prison. ...
